UnitOfMeasureClass.name: UnitOfMeasureClass
UnitOfMeasureClass.description: Represents a standard unit of measure dimension.

BaseUnitOfMeasureId.description: The base unit of measure that's used to calculate and display quantities.

Code.description: The unique user-defined string for the unit of measure class.

DefaultUnitOfMeasureId.description: The default unit of measure that's used to calculate and display quantities. This measure can be different from the base unit of measure and overridden by individual resources.

Description.description: The description of the unit of measure class.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when this record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

Name.description: Autogenerated identifier for the unit of measure class record.

Status.description: The status of the unit of measure class.

Type.description: The type of the unit of measure class.
